com.bumptech.glide.loader.image
Interface ImageLoader.ImageReadyCallback

Enclosing interface:
ImageLoader
public static interface ImageLoader.ImageReadyCallback

An interface defining a callback that will be passed to an ImageLoader and that should be called by the ImageLoader when a load completes either successfully or because of an exception.

Method Summary
 void onException(java.lang.Exception e)
          The method a loader should call when a load fails.
 boolean onImageReady(android.graphics.Bitmap image)
          The method a loader should call when a load completes successfully.
 

Method Detail

onImageReady

boolean onImageReady(android.graphics.Bitmap image)
The method a loader should call when a load completes successfully.

Parameters:
image - The requested image.
Returns:
True iff the loaded image was used by the class that requested it from the ImageLoader.

onException

void onException(java.lang.Exception e)
The method a loader should call when a load fails.

Parameters:
e - The exception that caused the load to fail, or null.
